XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Matrix communication plugin

TABLE.NAME: matrix_rooms
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the matrix room information associated with the communication instance.

FIELD.NAME: roomid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the matrix room instance.

FIELD.NAME: alias
FIELD.COMMENT: Room alias of the matrix room instance.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.
